messages.message:
All dependencies on `image-tasks` have been removed and merged into master, and the final steps of its *deletion* are under way!

If you notice problems in your local dev environment, where image-tasks isn’t starting properly, that’s ok! You don’t need it anymore! I am happy to answer questions if you run into any problems though (as always :blush:). I will also be monitoring <#CCY413CSU|> to make sure I didn’t break jenkins.

Specifically, I will be merging this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/18114#pullrequestreview-597972539) in at 5pm PST unless people have complaints about it, which will bring the number of image-tasks replicas down to 0 in dogfood (and everywhere it is deployed in the future). It will also remove image-tasks from provisioner.

As soon as different environments have had their number of replicas brought to 0, the corresponding groovy files can have their image-tasks stages deleted as part of this task (dogfood) (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/REF-342?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiNWIzNDRkZDdlNTY3NGIwNjkyMThhMmZiNzlkNDJmMTEiLCJwIjoiaiJ9), and this task (prod) (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/REF-343?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiMjVmNGZmYzc1ZmQwNDNhZmFlNDE0ODdlZTNhODA1N2EiLCJwIjoiaiJ9). I will also be removing the `distributed-tasks/celery/image-tasks` directory over the next few days.

Major thanks to @kunal for helping put this together, and if you have any feedback before I merge these final steps, let me know!
